[KIN 377](https://catalog.csun.edu/academics/kin/courses/kin-377/) is a course I teach at California State Northridge. The course is offered through the Department of Kinesiology and is required by all KIN majors. In addition to fall and spring semesters, KIN 377 is offered through Tseng College during the [winter](https://tsengcollege.csun.edu/programs/winter) and [summer](https://tsengcollege.csun.edu/programs/summer).

**Course description**

Study of principles, theories, and research evidence regarding the nature of motor performance and learning with particular emphasis on factors that impact learning a skill through practice.

::: callout-tip
If you're having trouble finding what you need for this course, be sure to check out the [Canvas page](https://canvas.csun.edu). It might have the resources you're looking for!
:::
